Issue.creator: btl5037
Issue.summary: Dependencys in requirements.txt and requirements-test.txt are not pinned and incompatible with newst versions
Issue.description: In requirements-test.txt for venv Docker Compose is set to `>= 1.7.0` Docker is set to `>= 3.0.0` and in requirements.txt requests is set to `>= 2.12.4` these set of requirements are no longer compatible with each other since Compose 1.24 and Docker 4.0 hit the pip repository. These requirements should be pinned to versions that are known to work with the current testing framework
